fields.title: Paris Jacket
fields.description: Paris Jacket is a very popular jacket

fields.title: Paris Jacket
fields.description: While traditional bomber jackets are leather, the style now also commonly appears in nylon and other materials.

fields.title: Paris Jacket
fields.description: The style originates from the US Air Force, where it was worn by flight crew members.

fields.title: Paris Jacket
fields.description: Also known as a flight jacket, a bomber jacket is a short, durable jacket with a zippered front and fitted or elastic waist and cuffs.
